meanings.definition: a person who works, especially for wages
meanings.sent1: The worker at the store helps customers find what they need.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker built a new house in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The worker at the bakery accidentally put salt instead of sugar in the cake.
meanings.sent4: She was a diligent worker, always striving to do her best in every task.
meanings.sent5: The worker in the garden carefully tended to each plant, ensuring they thrived.

meanings.definition: a machine or tool that operates automatically or semi-automatically
meanings.sent1: The robotic worker efficiently assembled the car parts on the production line.
meanings.sent2: The coffee maker is a reliable worker, brewing fresh coffee every morning.
meanings.sent3: The dishwasher worker suddenly stopped mid-cycle, leaving the dishes unwashed.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner is a silent worker, diligently cleaning the floors while everyone sleeps.
meanings.sent5: The printer worker tirelessly churned out copies of the report for the meeting.

meanings.definition: a person who is employed to do physical or mental work
meanings.sent1: The office worker spends hours typing reports and answering emails.
meanings.sent2: The farm worker harvested ripe fruits under the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The circus worker juggled flaming torches with ease and grace.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated worker, always putting in extra hours to meet deadlines.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was a curious worker, constantly exploring new ideas and experiments.
